languages.text: {n}Старик мягко улыбается.{/n} "Всем множеством знаний я поделиться не в силах — я познавал их всю жизнь. Но главной заповедью с тобой поделюсь я: сражайся с умом, не из ярости. И не ищи наслаждений в убийстве — тогда победишь".

{n}The Vizsier smiles gently.{/n} "I cannot share the full wealth of my knowledge, for it has taken me a lifetime to learn. But I can share this foremost lesson with you: be guided by reason, not fury, when you fight. And seek no pleasure in killing. That is how you will win."
languages.original_text: {n}Старик мягко улыбается.{/n} "Всем множеством знаний я поделиться не в силах — я познавал их всю жизнь. Но главной заповедью с тобой поделюсь я: сражайся с умом, не из ярости. И не ищи наслаждений в убийстве — тогда победишь".

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man smiles gently.{/n} "I cannot share the full wealth of my knowledge, for it has taken me a lifetime to learn. But I can share the supreme commandment with you: be guided by reason, not fury, when you fight. And seek no pleasure in killing; that is how you will win."

{n}The Vizsier smiles gently.{/n} "I cannot share the full wealth of my knowledge, for it has taken me a lifetime to learn. But I can share this foremost lesson with you: be guided by reason, not fury, when you fight. And seek no pleasure in killing. That is how you will win."

languages.text: {n}Der Wesir lächelt sanft.{/n} "Ich kann Euch nicht meinen gesamten Wissensschatz anvertrauen, denn es hat mich ein ganzes Leben gekostet, ihn anzuhäufen. Doch ich kann diese wichtigste Lektion mit Euch teilen: Lasst Euch im Kampf von der Vernunft leiten, nicht vom Zorn. Und sucht kein Vergnügen im Töten. So werdet Ihr gewinnen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier smiles gently.{/n} "I cannot share the full wealth of my knowledge, for it has taken me a lifetime to learn. But I can share this foremost lesson with you: be guided by reason, not fury, when you fight. And seek no pleasure in killing. That is how you will win."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Wesir lächelt sanft.{/n} "Ich kann Euch nicht meinen gesamten Wissensschatz anvertrauen, denn es hat mich ein ganzes Leben gekostet, ihn anzuhäufen. Doch ich kann diese wichtigste Lektion mit Euch teilen: Lasst Euch im Kampf von der Vernunft leiten, nicht vom Zorn. Und sucht kein Vergnügen im Töten. So werdet Ihr gewinnen."

languages.text: {n}El Visir sonríe con amabilidad.{/n} «No puedo compartir la totalidad de mi conocimiento, pues me ha llevado toda una vida aprenderlo. Pero puedo compartir con usted esta lección vital: en la batalla, guíese por la razón, no por la furia. Y no busque el placer en la muerte de sus enemigos. Así triunfará».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier smiles gently.{/n} "I cannot share the full wealth of my knowledge, for it has taken me a lifetime to learn. But I can share this foremost lesson with you: be guided by reason, not fury, when you fight. And seek no pleasure in killing. That is how you will win."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Visir sonríe con amabilidad.{/n} «No puedo compartir la totalidad de mi conocimiento, pues me ha llevado toda una vida aprenderlo. Pero puedo compartir con usted esta lección vital: en la batalla, guíese por la razón, no por la furia. Y no busque el placer en la muerte de sus enemigos. Así triunfará».

languages.text: {n}ヴィジールが優しく微笑む。{/n}「自分が持つ知識の価値を分けることはできない。なぜなら、私は生涯をかけて学んできたからだ。けれど、この最高に重要な教訓をあなたと分かち合うことであればできる。戦うときは、怒りではなく理性に導かれよ。そして殺すことに喜びを求めてはいけない。そうすれば勝てる」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier smiles gently.{/n} "I cannot share the full wealth of my knowledge, for it has taken me a lifetime to learn. But I can share this foremost lesson with you: be guided by reason, not fury, when you fight. And seek no pleasure in killing. That is how you will win."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィジールが優しく微笑む。{/n}「自分が持つ知識の価値を分けることはできない。なぜなら、私は生涯をかけて学んできたからだ。けれど、この最高に重要な教訓をあなたと分かち合うことであればできる。戦うときは、怒りではなく理性に導かれよ。そして殺すことに喜びを求めてはいけない。そうすれば勝てる」

languages.text: {n}宿老轻轻地笑了起来。{/n}“我无法分享我所有的知识，因为我花了一辈子的时间才彻底理解。不过，我可以告诉您最重要的事情——战斗时要保持理智，不要受愤怒驱使，也不要以杀戮为乐。只有这样，才能获得胜利。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier smiles gently.{/n} "I cannot share the full wealth of my knowledge, for it has taken me a lifetime to learn. But I can share this foremost lesson with you: be guided by reason, not fury, when you fight. And seek no pleasure in killing. That is how you will win."

traits.locale_text: {n}宿老轻轻地笑了起来。{/n}“我无法分享我所有的知识，因为我花了一辈子的时间才彻底理解。不过，我可以告诉您最重要的事情——战斗时要保持理智，不要受愤怒驱使，也不要以杀戮为乐。只有这样，才能获得胜利。”

languages.text: {n}Le vizir vous adresse un doux sourire.{/n} « Je serais bien incapable de partager toute l'étendue de mon savoir, car il m'a fallu une vie entière pour l'acquérir. Mais il est une leçon fondamentale que je peux vous prodiguer : lorsque vous combattez, laissez-vous guider par la raison, et non pas par la colère. Et surtout, ne cherchez pas de plaisir dans la mise à mort. C'est ainsi que vous vaincrez. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier smiles gently.{/n} "I cannot share the full wealth of my knowledge, for it has taken me a lifetime to learn. But I can share this foremost lesson with you: be guided by reason, not fury, when you fight. And seek no pleasure in killing. That is how you will win."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vizir vous adresse un doux sourire.{/n} « Je serais bien incapable de partager toute l'étendue de mon savoir, car il m'a fallu une vie entière pour l'acquérir. Mais il est une leçon fondamentale que je peux vous prodiguer : lorsque vous combattez, laissez-vous guider par la raison, et non pas par la colère. Et surtout, ne cherchez pas de plaisir dans la mise à mort. C'est ainsi que vous vaincrez. »

languages.text: {n}Vezir nazikçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "İrfanımın tüm detaylarını paylaşamam çünkü tüm bunları öğrenmem bir ömür aldı. Lakin sizinle şu çok önemli dersi paylaşabilirim: Savaşırken kılavuz olarak öfkeyi değil, mantığı alın. Öldürmede keyif aramayın. İşte zafere böyle erişirsiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier smiles gently.{/n} "I cannot share the full wealth of my knowledge, for it has taken me a lifetime to learn. But I can share this foremost lesson with you: be guided by reason, not fury, when you fight. And seek no pleasure in killing. That is how you will win."
